WildFly Elytron 1.0.0.Alpha2-SNAPSHOT

Package org.wildfly.security.keystore

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomicLoadKeyStore
    A KeyStore wrapper that makes the load operation atomic, in addition it also gives the ability to reverse the load call.
    EnablingPasswordEntry
    A password keystore entry that can be marked as disabled or enabled.
    ModifyTrackingKeyStore
    A KeyStore implementation that tracks if it's contents have been modified through the API since the last load / save.
    ModifyTrackingKeyStoreSpi
    The KeyStoreSpi implementation to track modifications.
    PasswordEntry
    A password keystore entry.
    PasswordKeyStoreSpi
    A password file formatted KeyStore implementation.
    PropertiesKeyStoreSpi
    A KeyStore implementation that is backed by the WildFly users properties file.
    UnmodifiableKeyStore
    A wrapper around KeyStore to make it unmodifiable.
    WrappingPasswordKeyStore
    A KeyStore which can store TwoWayPassword instances by wrapping another KeyStore which can store SecretKey instances.
